name: Vegan Caesar Dressing
description: Vegan Caesar Dressing that tastes like the real thing! Creamy and bursting with savory goodness, this dressing is ready in just 5 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon vegan Worcestershire sauce (optional but good)
6-8 cups chopped romaine, kale or a mix

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the raw cashew pieces in hot water for 5 minutes. I heat up water in my electric kettle and pour it over the cashews to soak. If you don't have a high powered blender, you should soak them longer, several hours or overnight in order to get them very soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the raw cashew pieces in hot water for 5 minutes. I heat up water in my electric kettle and pour it over the cashews to soak. If you don't have a high powered blender, you should soak them longer, several hours or overnight in order to get them very soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cashews and add to your blender. Add the remaining ingredients, including 3/4 cup fresh water, and blend until very smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the cashews and add to your blender. Add the remaining ingredients, including 3/4 cup fresh water, and blend until very smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with chopped romaine/kale or a mix, with vegan croutons and optional Vegan Parmesan for a delicious Caesar Salad. Enjoy!
